title: Is the voyage around the world by Pigafetta useful in today’s world? - Quora

response.answer_text: Undoubtedly. It is useful to know the events that led to today’s world and the attitudes which preceded our current attitudes. It is also an account of an astonishing feat.Pigafetta is the best source of information on the first voyage around the world in 1519–22, an unprecedted feat of exploration and seamanship. Out of five ships, one came back. Out of 240 men, 18 survived.
